mapper.select: SELECT shelter_file_id shelterFileId, shelter_id shelterId, shelter_file_name shelterFileName, shelter_file_size shelterFileSize, shelter_file_ext shelterFileExt, upload_date uploadDate FROM shelter_file WHERE shelter_id = #{shelterId}
mapper.update: UPDATE shelter SET introduction = #{introduction}, protect_duration = #{protectDuration}, shelter_phone = #{shelterPhone}, account = #{account}, active = #{active} WHERE shelter_id = #{shelterId}
mapper.select: SELECT shelter_id shelterId, shelter_name shelterName, account account FROM shelter

SELECT s.shelter_id shelterId, sf.shelter_file_id shelterFileId, s.shelter_name shelterName, s.create_date createDate, s.shelter_phone shelterPhone, s.account account, s.protect_duration protectDuration, a.post_code postCode, a.doro doro, a.detail_address detailAddress FROM shelter s LEFT JOIN shelter_file sf ON s.shelter_id = sf.shelter_id JOIN address a ON s.address_id = a.address_id
AND s.shelter_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shelterName},'%')
AND a.doro LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddress},'%')
ORDER BY s.shelter_id ASC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM shelter s JOIN address a ON s.address_id = a.address_id
AND s.shelter_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shelterName},'%')
AND a.doro LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddress},'%')

SELECT s.shelter_id shelterId, s.address_id addressId, s.shelter_name shelterName, DATE(s.create_date) createDate, s.introduction, s.protect_duration protectDuration, s.shelter_phone shelterPhone, s.account account, s.active active, a.post_code postCode, a.doro doro, a.detail_address detailAddress FROM shelter s LEFT JOIN address a ON s.address_id = a.address_id WHERE shelter_id = #{shelterId}
SELECT shelter_id shelterId, shelter_name shelterName FROM shelter WHERE shelter_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%');
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shelter(address_id, shelter_name, create_date, introduction, protect_duration, shelter_phone, account) VALUES(#{addressId}, #{shelterName}, NOW(), #{introduction}, #{protectDuration}, #{shelterPhone}, #{account})
